title: Topic 001 Question 089
body: You are migrating a production-critical on-premises application that requires 96 vCPUs to perform its task. You want to make sure the application runs in a similar environment on GCP. What should you do?
options: When creating the VM, use machine type n1-standard-96.
When creating the VM, use Intel Skylake as the CPU platform.
Create the VM using Compute Engine default settings. Use gcloud to modify the running instance to have 96 vCPUs.
Start the VM using Compute Engine default settings, and adjust as you go based on Rightsizing Recommendations.
